title: New: Orca Orca & QUALMS – When The Sun Comes Up / Ghost Bones
body: Split releases can be rather self-indulgent at times, especially when acts simply stick a couple of previously heard tracks onto a vinyl alongside efforts from one of their friends. Luckily, with this new release from **Orca Orca** & **QUALMS**, that’s certainly not the case. Having ‘introduced’ **Orca Orca** a couple of months back, it’s great to hear some new material from **Jim Hewitt**, in the form of the angelic _When The Sun Comes Up_. Production wise, it’s lo-fi at it’s purest, almost like a more pop-orientated **Wavves**, with the an extra guitar section from **QUALMS** adding another dimension to the track. On the flip side, _Ghost Bones_ is a more electronically induced affair, but maintaining the underlying pop tendencies. Check out both tracks below. Orca Orca / QUALMS – Split 7" by orca orca
